channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: The European Commission’s Web4 strategy might be a flop
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jonathan Galea, Matteo Vena
item.description: There’s a lot of work left to be done on Web 3.0. The European Commission is getting ahead of itself by trying to move to what it calls “Web 4.0.”

item.title: Crypto survey finds 47% of investors expect Ether to ‘surpass’ Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Fidelity Digital Assets gave a bullish forecast for ETH in the next 12 months, while a separate survey from CryptoVantage found 47% of investors expect Ether to “surpass” Bitcoin.

item.title: Centralized exchanges will become gateways for DeFi — dYdX Foundation CEO Charles d’Haussy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: CEO Charles d’Haussy doesn’t view centralized exchanges as competitors for dYdX.

item.title: What is a token maker, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Deer
item.description: A token maker provides the necessary infrastructure and functionalities for individuals or organizations to design, issue and manage their own tokens.

item.title: US lawmaker calls on SEC chair to reassess stance on crypto following Ripple ruling
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Rep. Ritchie Torres shares a surname with Judge Analisa Torres in the SEC v. Ripple case and referred to the XRP court ruling as the “Torres Doctrine."

item.title: South Korean Shinhan Bank completes stablecoin remittance pilot with Asian partners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The bank used the Hedera network to settle payments in South Korean, Thai and Taiwanese currencies in real-time in its second stablecoin pilot project.

item.title: Bitcoin rally will lead to "speculative blow-off top” in 2024, Mark Yusko predicts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: BlackRock's application for a spot Bitcoin ETF has kicked off the next Bitcoin bull run, which will culminate in 2024 with a speculative parabolic run, according to Morgan Creek Capital’s Mark Yusko.

item.title: Coinbase CEO will meet with US lawmakers to discuss crypto legislation: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The crypto exchange is currently involved in a legal battle with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission over allegedly offering unregistered securities.

item.title: 12 things blockchain protocols should consider when exploring AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Blockchain protocols can’t (and shouldn’t) ignore AI’s potential, but it’s important to implement it with caution and care.

item.title: Bitcoin bulls battle to reclaim $30K amid BTC price RSI ‘reset’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin returns to a tug-of-war over $30,000, with BTC price action costing its RSI weeks of upside.

item.title: EU stays on top of Web3 with metaverse, AI and crypto strategies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Over the last year, leaders in the European Union have been vocal about their desire to stay on top of the latest developments in Web3.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin shares account abstraction challenges in Ethereum: EthCC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Vitalik Buterin explained how an account abstraction extension called “paymasters” can allow users to pay for gas fees using “whatever coins that they are transferring.”

item.title: 9 AI coding tools every developer must know
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore nine crucial AI coding tools that empower developers to streamline their workflow, from machine learning frameworks to code editors.

item.title: Oasis launches Ethereum-compatible privacy blockchain Sapphire
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The new developer environment aims to drive privacy-first, cross-chain DApp development for the Ethereum ecosystem and smart contract blockchain networks.

item.title: Why is Dogecoin price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: Why is Dogecoin price down today?
item.description: Dogecoin price is down today as the effect of Elon Musk's DOGE rally fades away and the price of Bitcoin slips below $30,000.

item.title: Valkyrie ‘BRRR’ spot Bitcoin ETF enters SEC’s Nasdaq rulemaking list
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The SEC has accepted Valkyrie’s spot Bitcoin ETF filing for review. The fund would trade under “BRRR,” a reference to a popular meme in the Bitcoin community.

item.title: Internet Computer will be a key alternative to AWS-like services — Dfinity exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The Dfinity chief said that Internet Computer would prove to be a boon for the blockchain industry, which is currently dependent on centralized systems like Amazon Web Services.

item.title: Bitcoin price is ‘stuck’ at $30K — Here are 3 reasons why
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls face a cocktail of short-term holder and miner selling, along with a severe lack of volatility.

item.title: Marathon shareholders file lawsuit against company’s top management
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The CEO and other top executives are accused of a breach of fiduciary duties, unjust enrichment and wasting corporate assets.

item.title: Bankrupt Celsius to spend $24M from GK8 sale on legal expenses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: After buying GK8 for $115 million in 2021, Celsius has recouped $44 million of that but will spend most of the sum on legal fees.

item.title: Healthy competition welcome — Polygon zkEVM lead
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Prominent Ethereum development firms have rolled out varying zero-knowledge scaling solutions that drive healthy competition in the ecosystem.

item.title: Thodex CEO sentenced to Turkish prison for failure to submit tax documents
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Faruk Fatih Özer failed to submit the requested documents to the Tax Inspection Board. He denied being Thodex’s official at the time, which prevented him from presenting the requested books.

item.title: Crypto headcount surges over 100% since 2019 despite implosions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: While industry giants like Binance hire and lay off thousands of people, other crypto heavyweights like Tether only have 60 employees.

item.title: Threads copies Twitter again, introduces ‘rate limits’ to combat bots
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg’s copycat app has been forced to impose rate limits to block crypto and spam bots.

item.title: US regulatory clarity has begun in court after Ripple win: CFTC commissioner
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: CFTC Commissioner Caroline Pham says recent court opinions around digital assets and securities are a first step to crypto regulatory clarity.

item.title: SEC’s Gary Gensler believes AI can strengthen its enforcement regime
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission chair highlighted market surveillance and other instances where agency staff could benefit from making greater use of AI.

item.title: Apple’s headset could redefine what being in the metaverse means
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: KPMG's Head of Metaverse Alyse Sue believes the tech included in Apple’s mixed reality headset could shift the way users interact and experience the metaverse.

item.title: Crypto memes can be considered financial promotions, says UK watchdog
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Memes found to be non-compliant with financial promotion rules could carry up to two years in jail under a proposal from the FCA.

item.title: Chainlink launches cross-chain protocol bridging blockchain to TradFi
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Several top banks around the world are already collaborating with Chainlink to explore applications for the Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol.
